name: NEVER TRUST A CUBE
description:
This Game was Solo developed by me - Souf Zouak

This is my participation on the BenBonk Game Jam.

I hope you can enjoy it. I would love to get some feedback, because I am going to  continue working on this game and also upload it to itch. This is also my first "real" game btw.

"NEVER TRUST A CUBE" is a Platformer with Platforms and Spikes. They can also be  a bit Transparent. It partly was designed for Speedruns. 

----------------------

Music 

Dreamer by Hazy
https://soundcloud.com/hazy_music Music provided by https://www.plugnplaymusic.net
